net.sf.prefixedproperties.spring.environmentfactories

Class SystemEnvironmentFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.prefixedproperties.spring.environmentfactories.SystemEnvironmentFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EnvironmentFactory

    public class SystemEnvironmentFactory
extends Object
implements EnvironmentFactory
    The environment from System.genenv() and as a fallback from System.getProperty() The order can be changed by settings checkForSystemPropertyFirst to true
